report_title: Intravenous (IV) Solution Manufacturing in the US
executive_summary: Intravenous (IV) solution manufacturers supply hospitals and healthcare facilities with essential IV products. The steady growth in hospital demand and the crucial nature of medical treatments have provided some safeguards against economic downturns. In 2020, when faced with COVID-19 restrictions, industry revenue increased as most hospitalized patients needed IV products. But rising plastic materials and resin costs paired with a decline in overall health expenditure have curbed growth rates.
